    • Constructor Detail

      • Championship

        public Championship()

    • Method Detail

      • awardPoints

        public void awardPoints()
        This method is awarding the points to the drivers after each race and givig them ranks accordingly. Drivers are first being sorted by time and then by points for the ranking.

      • bonusFunction

        public void bonusFunction(int rainPer,
                          int lap)
        This method makes the drivers change their tyres to wet tyres if it rains. The probability to change to wet tyres is based on a random numberfor each driver.
        Parameters:
        rainPer - and lap are being used in this method to check rain in each lap, and then run the probability to chnage to wet tyres for each drivers.

      • chooseVenue

        public int chooseVenue()
        This method randomly generates a number to select 1 out of 8 venues. It also ensures that no venue is used twice for the championship
        Returns:
        int, as the venue has been given int numbers and this method geenrates numbers for the selection of the venue.

      • clearScreen

        public void clearScreen()
        This method is used to clear the screen.

      • displayChampionshipResult

        public void displayChampionshipResult()
        This method displays the winner of the championship. It displays the winner driver's name and points.

      • displayResults

        public void displayResults()
        This method displays the result of each race, by displaying the name and points, according to the sorted ranks.

      • inputNumOfRaces

        public int inputNumOfRaces()
        This method asks the user to input the number of races for the championship. The method also ensures that the races are between 3 to 5.
        Returns:
        int is returned in this method, as user is asked to input the number of races for the championship.

      • runLap

        public void runLap(int lap,
                   int rainPer)
        This method is called in every lap of each race to check all the validstions and conditions of the game. It checks the penalties for the drivers, their skills, faults and also the weather.
        Parameters:
        lap - and rainper are being used to check all the validations and conditions in each lap, including the probablity for rain.

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints(int position,
                      int driver)
        This method allocating points to the drivers after each race based on their positions at the end of each race.
        Parameters:
        position - and driver are being used are to check the position of each driver after the end of every race.

      • startChampionship

        public void startChampionship()
        This is one of the main method of this class. It starts the whole game by calling various methods from different classes. This method starts by asking the user for the number of races and shows the end result and also updates the driver.txt file with the new ranking.

      • startRace

        public void startRace(int avgTime,
                      int noOfLaps,
                      int rainPer)
        This methods asks the user to press enter to start the race. It also sets the drivers time for the racebased on the average time of the venue.
        Parameters:
        avgTime, - noOfLaps and rainPer are being used here to assign the average time of the venue to the driver after each race, it is running the number of laps for each race.
